products.title: Linosa Charcoal
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure linosa charcoal deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality deluxe roman blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 350mm max width: 2500mm
 	min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm
 	fabric composition: 100% polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: sidewinder control.
 	Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
